attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to take urgent action to protect the exchange rate value between the Sterling & Euro currencies.

With many businesses paying for goods to countries within the EU, not addressing the current Exchange rate is putting businesses at risk and they outgoings increase subject to exchange rates.

Stop throwing our money at banks hoping it will help businesses, and focus on more key areas that are seriously missing from the Governments plan, take action now and protect the Euro-Sterling rate.
